title: Javier A Zavaleta - Full Stack Developer & Automation Specialist
description: A Full Stack Engineer & Automation Specialist with 5 years of experience building scalable web applications and automating enterprise workflows. Skilled in CRM integrations (Dynamics 365, HubSpot) and custom automations that reduce operational costs and improve lead capture efficiency. Proven ability to modernize websites, optimize performance (25% faster load times), and deliver automations that save hundreds of hours annually.
